name: Open-Role-Tracker
description: Open-Role-Tracker identifies companies actively hiring for specific roles in a given location. It searches job listings in real time, extracts structured details, and ranks companies by relevance - perfect for recruiters, job seekers, and market analysts.

appStages.name: Introduction
Run

      "content": "\u003cdiv class\u003d\"introduction\"\u003e\n  \u003cdiv class\u003d\"header\"\u003e\n    \u003ch3\u003eOpen Role Tracker\u003c/h3\u003e\n  \u003c/div\u003e\n  \u003csection\u003e\n    \u003cul\u003e\n      \u003cli\u003e\n        \u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003eUse the form below to track active job listings in your specified location.\n\n      \u003c/li\u003e\n    \u003c/ul\u003e\n  \u003c/section\u003e\n\u003c/div\u003e",
